import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./CampaignCard.css"; const CampaignCardItem = (props) => { const [isFund, setIsFund] = useState(false); async function fundCampaignHandler() { setIsFund(true); if (typeof window.ethereum !== "undefined") { await window.ethereum.request({ method: "eth_requestAccounts" }); } } return (

{props.ngo}

{props.email}

{props.phone}

{" "} Mission :

{props.objective}

{" "} Minimum Acceptable Donation :

{props.minimum}

{" "} Target Amount :

{props.target}

{" "} MetaMask Wallet Address :

{props.wallet}
{isFund && (
)}
); }; export default CampaignCardItem;
